description: Source code for a LitElement-based web component 'todo-footer' that renders the footer section of a TodoMVC application, including filters and clear completed button.

classes.name: TodoFooter
classes.description: A web component class extending LitElement, responsible for rendering the footer of a TodoMVC app, including filter links and clear completed button.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the footer HTML, including item count, filter links, and clear completed button if applicable.

methods.name: #onClearCompletedClick
methods.description: Event handler that dispatches a ClearCompletedEvent to clear completed todos.
